FuncDef:
The mpls-oam command displays the MPLS-OAM view.
The undo mpls-oam command deletes the MPLS-OAM view and MPLS OAM configurations.
By default, no MPLS-OAM view is created.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
The mpls-oam command must be run before MPLS OAM is configured for monitoring service links.
You can run other MPLS OAM commands only after running the mpls-oam command to display the MPLS-OAM view.
Prerequisites
MPLS OAM has been globally enabled using the mpls oam command.
Configuration Impact
After the undo mpls-oam command is run, the MPLS-OAM view and MPLS OAM configurations are deleted.
Follow-up Procedure
Run the mpls oam l2vc command to configure detection parameters.
